news.title: JPMorgan Chase tops estimates as trading revenue exceeds expectations
news.summary: JPMorgan will give investors a view into how consumers and corporations fared toward the end of last year. JPMorgan will issue guidance on how 2026 may develop.

news.title: Delta CEO sees record earnings in reach again thanks to high-end travel demand
news.summary: The airline said bookings are strong from both leisure customers and corporate travelers in the first few days of the year. The airline said it has seen strong bookings from both corporate travelers and leisure customers.

news.title: Global central bankers unite in defense of Fed Chair Jerome Powell
news.summary: Global central bankers issued a statement Tuesday defending U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell. The statement follows the launch of a criminal investigation into the central bank chief.

news.title: Salesforce releases updated Slackbot powered by Anthropic's AI model
news.summary: Slack is upgrading Slackbot, its personal assistant, with generative AI. Slackbot is a combination of Slack's personal assistant and its chatbot.

news.title: Fanatics to launch sports media and entertainment studio
news.summary: Fanatics Studios will create, produce and distribute films, documentaries, live events and digital series. The company will be based in New York City.

news.title: American stocks underperformed last year. Deutsche Bank says it could happen again.
news.summary: All the risks are sitting in U.S. stocks, argues Deutsche Bank. Investors should be considering some diversification toward Europe, argues the bank.

news.title: The airplane orders keep coming, and Boeing’s stock climbs to a two-year high
news.summary: Boeing received orders for up to 60 more planes, a week after receiving orders for 145 planes. The orders are expected to be announced later this month. Boeing's stock was up 2.7% on Monday.

news.title: The Supreme Court may rule Wednesday on Trump’s tariffs. But here’s what it means if it holds off again.
news.summary: The Supreme Court has indicated it may release opinions on Wednesday. But analysts are emphasizing the justices could keep holding off on releasing their decision. The ruling in a crucial tariff case is coming.

news.title: These stocks are steady-eddies if S&P 500 earnings growth slips and the market slides
news.summary: 20 low P/E stocks that should resist a market downturn. 20 low P-E stocks with low valuations. 20 stocks with high valuations that should be able to withstand a downturn.

news.title: How Trump’s attacks on Powell and the Fed could actually bring more inflation
news.summary: If the White House erodes the public’s trust in the Fed, all bets are off. If the Fed erodes public trust in its desire or ability to keep inflation low and stable, it is in trouble.
